Miami.Four Seasons Hotel Miami: The Four Seasons Hotel and Tower, also known as the Four Seasons Hotel Miami, is a 70-story, 789 feet (240 m) skyscraper in Miami, Florida, United States. Located in Downtown Miami's Brickell Financial District, it is the second tallest building in Miami as well as in Florida. The tower contains a Four Seasons Hotel property, office space and several residential condominium units on the upper floors.
